text: The Geheime Feldpolizei (GFP or Gefeldpo) (English: Secret Field Police) was the German secret military police of Nazi Germanyâ€™s German Army the regular army branch of Wehrmacht Military from 1939 until 1945 when it was disbanded. The GFP was under the control of the Wehrmacht under the German Military Chief and German Army Field Marshall Wilhelm Keitel from 1938-1945 . Category:Nazi Germany Category:Law enforcement agencies Category:1939 establishments in Germany Category:1945 disestablishments in Germany
title: Geheime Feldpolizei
